item.title: RAID Forever
item.description: MegaCLI (LSI) PERC Command line client is herein case you’re looking for it too. This is a zip containing a zip containing an rpm file. Just alien it and you’re almost done. The cheats sheet you can find on the internetis rather ok, except for the download link I just wrote down.
